@Outlook any suggestions for why the Outlook iOS app is hanging up during the authentication step when adding a Gmail account?

The bar just keeps moving along like it cannot connect to the authentication service. pic.twitter.com/xivzTU7oml

Not anymore. After heading back to http://outlook.com , it worked again, no more issues. I suggest providing more error info so that your support staff can get more info when a user has unknown issues, rather than throwing up your hands and saying "we don't know either"

No problem. I really like the overall look & feel of the app. Both mail and calendar. Feels very intuitive and natural. Favorite would be the non-constructive calendar icons and the same for showing attachmens in mail.
@Outlook i keep geting junk mail in my inbox i keep blocking it etc and still keep getting it been with you since 1999 and ever had a issue untill now

Love it when it comes to the mail part and it’s the given mail client choice for the whole family. Unfortunately we can’t use the calendar at all because we need to have a shared family calendar we actually can use. Fix this thing and we are all in with using all of Outlook. ;-)

I can’t fix it please help me

Can you guys rewrite all of Outlook so it doesn't hang when the network is flaky, or it has to handle more than a few emails?  You might need to rewrite Exchange as well, so I feel that would be a great progress for humanity.

@outlook lied to me, they said they will fix my other email address, but never did. I m reporting them to @actionfrauduk
No. Turns out to be a malware issue. I ran Malwarebytes, and voila!
Yep. Mobile outlook is the only issue

Still no good. I am not talking about just regular domains... I am talking about entire TLDs (Top Level Domains such as .eu; .cn; or .ru). You cannot specify wild cards or entire TLDs in the Junk Email ‘Blocked Senders and Domains’ area (see error in red). pic.twitter.com/5QBGN7fpGq

Off days is right #outlook. In my situation, it wasn't only that I wanted the hyphen in my email address. You also did something on your end - like deleting our files.  Good thing is that you are still working on it and one issue was solved on my end. #teamwork #offdays #roses
